benchmark_details.name: From Code to Play: Benchmarking Program Search for Games Using Large Language Models
benchmark_details.overview: This work introduces an easy-to-use and extensible framework to evaluate the current performance of LLMs for the synthesis of game-related program code through various game-related tasks.
benchmark_details.data_type: Python and Java code for gaming applications

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the current state-of-the-art of LLM-based program search for various gaming applications using an extensible framework.

data.source: LLM-generated code evaluations across varying game applications.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the successful execution of the generated Python and Java code during various game scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rewards indicate better performance of the synthesized code in gaming environments.
